fest-mocks v. 0.1-SNAPSHOT

This document is the API specification for the FEST Mocks Module 0.1.

Packages
org.fest.mocks Provides utility classes to simplify usage of EasyMock.

 

This document is the API specification for the FEST Mocks Module 0.1.

The FEST mocks module is an Open Source library (Apache 2.0 license) that simplify usage of mock objects.

For more information, please read more about the EasyMockTemplate.
